videos.title: Melting Mann Gravel Race, Vandaila MI
videos.description:
Cass County Michigan’s 8th Annual Dirt Road Bike Challenge - Melting Mann, named after the challenging gravel road - the Mann Road. Riding the 35 mile route (24 mile and 60 mile routes were also available). 10th place out of 33 in 40-49 age category. 37th out of 161 overall. 

35 mile route pre-ride -  00:00
35 mile Melting Mann start -  03:31
Huff Rd (mile 9) - 10:13
Patterson Hill climb (mile 17) - 14:51
Mann Rd - 16:28
Rumsey Rd (mile 21) - 21:05
Kirk Lake Rd (mile 27) - 27:51
Lewis Rd (mile31) - 30:43

The ride stats. - https://strava.app.link/taHXx924Gjb

videos.title: Melting Mann Gravel Bike Race 2022
videos.description: Here are some super-slow motion video clips from the March 19th, 2022 Melting Mann gravel bike race in Vandalia Michigan.  I was just a spectator not an official photographer.  I was having fun and they were working hard.  I don’t like work!  I did not cover the event but went to sections that the 24 mile was on so there is a lot missing, I think I got some faster 34 and 60 mi riders also.   For my photographer friends: Video was shot with a Sony A7SIII camera at ISO 12,800 (not a typo)  1/500  sec, f-9.0 in HD, S-Log3 10 bit 4:2:2, 240 fps
